com.algolia.search.saas.places

Class PlacesQuery

  • Object
    • com.algolia.search.saas.AbstractQuery
      • com.algolia.search.saas.places.PlacesQuery

  • public class PlacesQuery
extends AbstractQuery

    Search parameters for Algolia Places.

    See Also:
    PlacesClient.searchAsync(PlacesQuery, CompletionHandler)

      • setQuery

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setQuery(String query)

        Set the full text query.

      • getQuery

        public String getQuery()

      • setAroundLatLng

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setAroundLatLng(AbstractQuery.LatLng location)

        Force to first search around a specific latitude/longitude. The default is to search around the location of the user determined via his IP address (geoip).

        Parameters:
        location - The location to start the search at, or null to use the default.

      • getAroundLatLng

        public AbstractQuery.LatLng getAroundLatLng()

      • setAroundLatLngViaIP

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setAroundLatLngViaIP(Boolean enabled)

        Search first around the geolocation of the user found via his IP address. Default: true.

        Parameters:
        enabled - Whether to use IP address to determine geolocation, or null to use the default.

      • getAroundLatLngViaIP

        public Boolean getAroundLatLngViaIP()

      • setAroundRadius

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setAroundRadius(Integer radius)

        Change the radius for around latitude/longitude queries.

        Parameters:
        radius - The radius to set, or RADIUS_ALL to disable stopping at a specific radius, or null to use the default.

      • getAroundRadius

        public Integer getAroundRadius()

        Get the current radius for around latitude/longitude queries.

        Returns:
        Query.RADIUS_ALL if set to ‘all’.

      • setHitsPerPage

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setHitsPerPage(Integer nbHitsPerPage)

        Set how many results you want to retrieve per search. Default: 20.

      • getHitsPerPage

        public Integer getHitsPerPage()

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setType(PlacesQuery.Type type)

        Set the type of place to search for.

        Parameters:
        type - Type of place to search for.

      • getType

        public PlacesQuery.Type getType()

      • setLanguage

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setLanguage(String language)

        Restrict the search results to a single language. You can pass two letters country codes (ISO 639-1).

        Parameters:
        language - The language used to return the results, or null to use all available languages.
        Returns:
        This query.

      • getLanguage

        public String getLanguage()

      • setCountries

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery setCountries(String... countries)

        Restrict the search results to a specific list of countries. You can pass two letters country codes (ISO 3166-1). Default: Search on the whole planet.

        Parameters:
        countries - The countries to restrict the search to, or null to search on the whole planet.
        Returns:
        This query.

      • getCountries

        public String[] getCountries()

      • set

        @NonNull
public PlacesQuery set(@NonNull
                                String name,
                                @Nullable
                                Object value)

        Set a parameter in an untyped fashion. This low-level accessor is intended to access parameters that this client does not yet support.

        Overrides:
        set in class AbstractQuery
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter’s name.
        value - The parameter’s value, or null to remove it. It will first be converted to a String by the toString() method.
        Returns:
        This instance (used to chain calls).
